parameters.name: DIJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the synchronization task.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description: The type of event that you want to query. Valid values: Failover, Alarm, and DDL.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.
